name: Business Analytics for Data Scientists
description_short: Focuses on the application of data science to critical problems and opportunities in business.

name: Technical Bootcamp
description_short: Bootcamp for new online MSDS students

name: Exploratory Text Analytics
description_short: Introduction to text analytics with a focus on long-form documents, such as reviews, news articles, and novels. Focus on unsupervised methods.

name: Foundations of Computer Science
description_short: A foundation in discrete mathematics, data structures, algorithmic design and implementation, computational complexity, parallel computing, and data integrity.

name: Programming for Data Science
description_short: Programming essentials for data science: Python, R, GitHub

name: Big Data Systems
description_short: Use Spark for large-scale analytics and machine learning. Basics of AWS cloud tools.

name: Practice and Application of Data Science
description_short: Build skills to acquire, clean, analyze, understand, and interpret data

name: Big Data Ethics
description_short: Examines the ethical issues arising around big data.

name: Data Science Capstone Project Work I
Data Science Capstone Project Work II
Statistical Learning
description_short: Fundamentals of data mining and machine learning within a common statistical framework

name: Bayesian Machine Learning
description_short: Build Bayesian models to provide predictions and quantify the uncertainty in these predictions

name: Data Visualization
description_short: Teaches visual and spatial thinking coupled with visual data tools and interactive web coding to envision information

name: Linear Models for Data Science
description_short: An introduction to linear statistical models in the context of data science

name: Practice and Application of Data Science Part 2
Big Data Ethics Part 2
description_short: Examines the ethical issues arising around big data.
